Verses: 1 appozhudhu Saamuvel Isravelar Anaivaraiyum Nokki: Idho, Neengal Enakkuch Chonnapatiyellaam Ungal Sorkettu Ungalukku Oru Raajaavai Erpatuththinen.

2 ippodhum Idho, Raajaavaanavar Ungalukku Munpaakach Chanjariththuvarukiraar; Naano Kizhavanum Naraiththavanumaanen; En Kumaarar Ungalotiruppaarkal; Naan En Siruvayadhumudhal Innaalvaraikkum Ungalukku Munpaakach Chanjariththuvandhen.

3 idho, Irukkiren; Karththarin Sannidhiyilum Avar Apishekampanni Vaiththavarukku Munpaakavum Ennaikkuriththuch Chaatchi Sollungal; Naan Yaarutaiya Erudhai Etuththukkonten? Yaarutaiya Kazhudhaiyai Etuththukkonten? Yaarukku Aniyaayanjeydhen? Yaarukku Itukkanseydhen? Yaar Kaiyil Paridhaanam Vaangikkontu Kansaataiyaayirundhen? Sollungal; Appatiyuntaanaal Adhai Ungalukkuth Thirumpak Kotuppen Endraan.
4 adharku Avarkal: Neer Engalukku Aniyaayanj Cheyyavum Illai; Engalukku Itukkan Seyyavum Illai; Oruvar Kaiyilum Ondrum Vaangavum Illai Endraarkal.

5 adharku Avan: Neengal En Kaiyil Ondrum Kantupitikkavillai Enpadharkuk Karththar Ungalukku Edhiraakach Chaatchiyaayirukkiraar, Avar Apishekam Panninavarum Indru Adharkuch Chaatchi Endraan; Adharku Avarkal: Avar Saatchi Thaan Endraarkal.
6 appuram Saamuvel Janangalai Nokki: Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Erpatuththinavarum, Ungal Pidhaakkalai Ekipdhudhesaththilirundhu Purappatappanninavarum Karththare.
7 ippodhum Karththar Ungalukkum Ungal Pidhaakkalukkum Seydhuvandha Ellaa Needhiyaana Kiriyaikalaikkuriththum, Naan Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Ungalote Niyaayam Pesumpatikku Neengal Nillungal.

8 yaakkopu Ekipdhile Poyirukkumpodhu, Ungal Pidhaakkal Karththarai Nokki Muraiyittaarkal, Appozhudhu Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Anuppinaar; Avarkal Ungal Pidhaakkalai Ekipdhilirundhu Azhaiththuvandhu, Avarkalai Indha Sdhalaththile Kutiyirukkappanninaarkal.

9 avarkal Thangal Thevanaakiya Karththarai Marandhupokirapodhu, Avar Avarkalai Aadhsorin Senaapadhiyaakiya Siseraavin Kaiyilum, Pelisdharin Kaiyilum, Movaapiya Raajaavin Kaiyilum Vitruppottaar; Ivarkal Avarkalukku Virodhamaaka Yuththampanninaarkal.

10 aakaiyaal Avarkal Karththarai Nokki Muraiyittu: Naangal Karththarai Vittup Paakaalkalaiyum Asdharoththaiyum Seviththadhinaale, Paavanjeydhom; Ippozhudhu Engal Saththurukkalin Kaikku Engalai Neengalaakki Ratchiyum; Ini Ummaich Chevippom Endraarkal.

11 appozhudhu Karththar Erupaakaalaiyum Pedhaanaiyum Yepdhaavaiyum Saamuvelaiyum Anuppi, Neengal Payamillaamal Kutiyirukkumpatikkuch Chutrilum Irundha Ungal Saththurukkalin Kaikkum Ungalai Neengalaakki Ratchiththaar.

12 ammon Puththirarin Raajaavaakiya Naakaas Ungalukku Virodhamaai Varukiradhai Neengal Kantapodhu, Ungal Thevanaakiya Karththare Ungalukku Raajaavaayirundhum, Neengal Ennai Nokki: Appatiyalla, Oru Raajaa Engalmel Aalaventum Endreerkal.
13 ippodhum Neengal Ventum Endru Virumpith Therindhukonta Raajaa, Idho, Irukkiraar; Idho, Karththar Ungalukku Oru Raajaavai Erpatuththinaar.

14 neengal Karththarutaiya Vaakkukku Virodhamaaik Kalakampannaamal Karththarukkup Payandhu, Avaraich Cheviththu, Avarutaiya Saththaththirkuk Keezhppatindhaal, Neengalum Ungalai Aalukira Raajaavum Ungal Thevanaakiya Karththaraip Pinpatrukiravarkalaayiruppeerkal.

15 neengal Karththarutaiya Saththaththirkuk Keezhppatiyaamal, Karththarutaiya Vaakkukku Virodhamaaik Kalakampannineerkalaanaal, Karththarutaiya Kai Ungal Pidhaakkalukku Virodhamaayirundhadhu Pola Ungalukkum Virodhamaayirukkum.
16 ippozhudhu Karththar Ungal Kankalukku Munpaakach Cheyyum Periya Kaariyaththai Nindru Paarungal.

17 indru Kodhumai Aruppin Naal Allavaa? Neengal Ungalukku Oru Raajaavaik Kettadhinaal, Karththarin Paarvaikkuch Cheydha Ungalutaiya Pollaappup Periyadhendru Neengal Kantu Unarumpatikku, Naan Karththarai Nokki Vinnappampannuven; Appozhudhu Iti Muzhakkangalaiyum Mazhaiyaiyum Kattalaiyituvaar Endru Solli,

18 saamuvel Karththarai Nokki Vinnappampanninaan; Andraiyadhiname Karththar Itimuzhakkangalaiyum Mazhaiyaiyum Kattalaiyittaar; Appozhudhu Janangal Ellaarum Karththarukkum Saamuvelukkum Mikavum Payandhu;

19 saamuvelaip Paarththu: Naangal Saakaadhapatikku Ummutaiya Thevanaakiya Karththaritaththil Ummutaiya Atiyaarukkaaka Vinnappam Seyyum; Naangal Seydha Ellaap Paavangalotum Engalukku Oru Raajaa Ventum Endru Ketta Indhap Paavaththaiyum Koottikkontom Endru Janangal Ellaarum Sonnaarkal.

20 appozhudhu Saamuvel Janangalai Nokki: Payappataadheyungal; Neengal Indhap Pollaappaiyellaam Seydheerkal; Aakilum Karththarai Vittup Pinvaangaamal Karththarai Ungal Muzhuirudhayaththotum Seviyungal.
21 vilakippokaadhirungal; Matrappati Pirayojanamatradhum Ratchikkamaattaadhadhumaayirukkira Veenaanavaikalaip Pinpatruveerkal; Avaikal Veenaanavaikale.
22 karththar Ungalaith Thamakku Janamaakkikkollap Piriyamaanapatiyinaal, Karththar Thammutaiya Makaththuvamaana Naamaththinimiththam Thamadhu Janaththaik Kaivitamaattaar.

23 naanum Ungalukkaaka Vinnappam Seyyaadhiruppenaakil Karththarukku Virodhamaakap Paavanjeykiravanaayiruppen; Adhu Enakkuth Thooramaayiruppadhaaka; Nanmaiyum Sevvaiyumaana Vazhiyai Naan Ungalukkup Podhippen.

24 neengal Eppatiyum Karththarukkup Payandhu, Ungal Muzhuirudhayaththotum Unmaiyaai Avaraich Chevikkakkataveerkal; Avar Ungalitaththil Evvalavu Makimaiyaana Kaariyangalaich Cheydhaar Enpadhaich Chindhiththuppaarungal.
25 neengal Innum Pollaappaich Cheyyave Seyveerkalaanaal, Neengalum Ungal Raajaavum Naasamataiveerkal Endraan.
